summary: This document is an email chain from August 16, 2019, regarding the status of surveillance cameras at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. It includes updates on camera outages and operational status, with communications between an Associate Warden and a Communication/Electronic Technician.

persons.name: Mila
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email in the chain, forwarding a report about camera status at MCC New York.

persons.name: Jeff
persons.context: Mentioned as a technician from Signet who will be working on testing the camera system on generator power at MCC New York.

connections.description: Both are involved in the operational and technical maintenance of surveillance systems at MCC New York, as indicated in the email chain about camera status.

events.title: Daily camera status report at MCC New York
events.description: An email chain provides updates on the status of surveillance cameras in various units (SHU, Unit 2, PCU, 10 South) at MCC New York, noting outages and operational cameras.

events.title: Camera system update and technician visit scheduled
events.description: An update indicates that 141-146 cameras are recording out of 161 total, with 15-20 needing work, and Jeff from Signet is scheduled to finish work and test the system on generator power.

locations: MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The email chain is dated August 16, 2019, which is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
It details the status of surveillance cameras at MCC New York, with 161 total cameras and 23 outages (14.3% outage rate) as of August 16, 2019.
The communication emphasizes daily updates on camera operational status to the Warden, Captain, and Associate Warden, highlighting institutional focus on surveillance.
A technician from Signet (Jeff) is mentioned as scheduled to work on the camera system and test it on generator power.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting relevance to investigations into the circumstances surrounding his death.
